content: चेतन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [चित्-ल्यु] {@--1@} Animate, alive, living, sentient, feeling; चेतनाचेतनेषु <ls>Me. 5</ls> animate and inanimate. {@--2@} Visible, conspicuous, distinguished. --नः {@--1@} A sentient being, a man. {@--2@} Soul, mind. {@--3@} The supreme soul. {@--4@} An animal in general. --ना {@--1@} Sense, consciousness; चुलुकयति मदीयां चेतनां चंचरीकः <ls>R. G.</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 31</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 12</ls>, <ls>R. 12. 74</ls>; चेतनां प्रतिपद्यते regains one's consciousness. {@--2@} Understanding, intelligence; पश्चिमाद्यामिनीयामात्प्रसादमिव चेतना <ls>R. 17. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Life, vitality, animation; <ls>Bg. 13. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Wisdom, reflection. --नं {@--1@} Appearance. {@--2@} The thinking principle, the mind.
